title: Introducing: Vasser
body:
Eighteen year old **Vasser** wears his influences on the sleeves of his latest track, _Whatever You Need_, yet manages to meticulously conjure up a sound all his own.

The likes of Jamie XX, James Blake and Jon Hopkins all shine through on the shimmering, slightly dexterous production, whilst showcasing a knack for finding a killer hook. Check out Whatever You Need below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
